product_name: Julbo Bivouak Photochromic Glacier Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: The Julbo Bivouak with photochromic lenses prove that one pair of sunglasses really can do it all! Wear them in low to extreme light, on the glacier and on the trail for protection in any condition. Zebra(R) photochromic NXT lenses respond quickly to changing light conditions, darken in bright light and lighten in dim light. NXT polyurethane lens material provides exceptional optical clarity and visual comfort. Extremely flexible and impact- esistant, NXT lenses are guaranteed not to break or crack. NXT lenses feature a long-lasting antifog coating that stops condensation from forming on lens surfaces. Lightweight, tough nylon frames feature flexible temples that allow sunglasses to fit to various face shapes naturally. Unique magnetic side-shields protect the eyes from light and wind; can be removed quickly and easily as needed. Ergonomically bent temples allow a snug and comfortable fit. Includes a protective case.
short_description: The Julbo Bivouak with photochromic lenses prove that one pair of sunglasses really can do it all! Wear them in low to extreme light, on the glacier and on the trail for protection in any condition.
